name: get_execution_log_endpoint
description: Get the execution log for a given execution log id.

$block: This is a summary of the results given the action that was executed.

$ul: **action_used**: The name of the action that was executed.
**additional_results**: The rest of the full results. Always returns an array of objects
**assistant_hint**: A hint for the assistant on what to do next.
**error**: The error message if the execution failed.
**id**: The id of the execution log.
**input_params**: The params we used / will use to execute the action.
**result**: A trimmed down result of the first item of the full results. Ideal for humans and language models!
**result_field_labels**: Human readable labels for some of the keys in the result.
**review_url**: The URL to run the action or review the AI choices the AI made for input_params given instructions.
**status**: The status of the execution. (default: success)
